hymn.title: Lord, You are the General
hymn.category: Praise of the Lord—His Victory and Exaltation

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You are the Gen -- er -- al Lead -- ing us tri -- um -- phant -- ly; We Your lit -- tle cap -- tives, Lord, Show -- ing forth Your vic -- to -- ry. Take me cap -- tive, Lord, Nev -- er let me win; De -- feat me all the time And con -- quer me with -- in.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, You are the General Leading us triumphantly; We Your little captives, Lord, Showing forth Your victory.
Take me captive, Lord, Never let me win; Defeat me all the time And conquer me within.
Lord, I open all the way Just to be invaded; By Your Spirit all renewed Till I'm permeated.
Day by day I grow, Be the stronger part; Lord, for this I pray, You make Your home my heart.
